testcase.name: test_04_get_single_campaign
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_campaign_modification.py:101: in test_04_get_single_campaign assert response.status_code == 200, f"GET campaign failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: GET campaign failed: {"detail":"Campaign not found"} E assert 404 == 200 E + where 404 = <Response [404]>.status_code
